channel.title: Legend Scape
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/34hyv4x.jpg[/img] Link: http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Legend%20Scape I apologize for my horrible graphic skills! D:
Legend Scape, is an Edgeville [u]PK[/u] server.
While most of the server is based around the wild, we also have 2 main bosses, Nex which drops its famous torva, virtus and pernix which are only obtainable via donation and PvM. The next boss is Jad, which you can defeat without suffering its 63 waves for a fire cape, which is only obtainable via Pk Point shops (10 PkP) and PvM.
You can obtain multiple armour sets and items using the achievements tab. [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/34pfjf4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2lj0oya.png[/img]
You buy Pk Point items from the Queen: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/29z2zki.png[/img] Sell Pk Point items to Aubury for GP: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2lm9t2f.png[/img] Buy Donor Point items from the Shop Assistant: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2wc378o.png[/img] Sell Donor Point items to Devon for GP: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2extqxj.png[/img]
Dice Zone: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/azdzqs.png[/img] Nex: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2reh951.png[/img]
GP is used to [u][b]dice[/b][/u] and will be used for great rewards in the future.
We hope to see you soon in-game!
~Legend Scape~
Current Staff Team ~Owner~ Emily ~Moderator~ Sprite
Emily is adding more content daily.[/center]
Links Again: http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Legend%20Scape

I apologize for my horrible graphic skills! D:

Legend Scape, is an Edgeville PK server.

While most of the server is based around the wild, we also have 2 main bosses, Nex which drops its famous torva, virtus and pernix which are only obtainable via donation and PvM. The next boss is Jad, which you can defeat without suffering its 63 waves for a fire cape, which is only obtainable via Pk Point shops (10 PkP) and PvM.

You can obtain multiple armour sets and items using the achievements tab.

You buy Pk Point items from the Queen:

Sell Pk Point items to Aubury for GP:
